name: Owlchemy
description: Owlchemy is a potion-creating, mini-game compilation within a role-playing game (RPG). The player must support their team of NPCs as they fight enemies through creating and distributing potions with various effects to their teammates. To create a potion, the player plays a short and simple mini-game, usually lasting less than 10 seconds, with a core verb as direction. Each potion has a different effect and it is up to the player to observe the pace of the battle and create the potion that the circumstances demand.
